oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Business - Holiday Inn
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Holiday Inn on James Robertson Parkway at 8th Avenue North opened in January of 1960. The one million dollar, one hundred unit hotel was north of the Tennessee State Capitol building. 3 x 4 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Holiday Inn
Business; Tourism
Nashville (Tenn.); Eighth Avenue North; James Robertson Parkway
